Source.Name: perl-extutils-install
Source.Summary: ExtUtils::Install - install files from here to there
Source.Description: Handles the installing and uninstalling of perl modules, scripts, man pages, etc... Both install() and uninstall() are specific to the way ExtUtils::MakeMaker handles the installation and deinstallation of perl modules. They are not designed as general purpose tools.

Package.Name: perl-extutils-install
